ProductInfo.Features:
Live Motion: The Smart Pan Tilt Controller allows for stable motion with great precision. The moving speed range is from 1% to 100% allowing you to choose the speed you need. A ramping function is also available. The controller allows you to repeat movments for various shooting scenarios.
Timelapse: The Smart Pan Tilt Controller can film a perfect-time-lapse. You just need to set the interval time, moving time, and frame rate and let the controller handle the rest.
Stop Motion: The Stop Motion feature allows you to shoot a stop motion, the camera also can be moved with the smart motion controller. The minimum movement per stop is 1mm.
Note: the slider is not included. Also item will be shipped from South Korea by FedEx or EMS. It usually takes 3-5 business to US.
ProductInfo.Name: Konova Timelapse / Smart Pan Tilt Motion Controller Bundle B for K5 60
